verses.roman:
ei-mata śacī-gṛhe satata bhojana
śrīvāsera gṛhe karena kīrtana-darśana

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; śacī-gṛhe—at the house of Śacīmātā; satata—always; bhojana—eating; śrīvāsera gṛhe—in the house of Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura; karena—performs; kīrtana-darśana—visiting the kīrtana performances.
translation: In this way Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu used to eat at the temple of Śacīmātā every day and also visit the house of Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura when kīrtana was performed.
